description:
## Objective
The objective is to set up everything you need to start contributing code to the Mifos X Web App and write a guide on the steps to setup Mifos Community App.

### Description
1. Run the project on your own system following the steps as mentioned in the Readme of the repository.
2. Write a blog on how to get started on the project and the entire setup 

## What to Submit
1. Aguide describing the setup of the Community App

## How to get help 
If you need help, be sure to post your question to our [developer mailing list](http://mifos.org/resources/community/communications/#mailing-lists) or ask in our [chatroom](https://gitter.im/openMF/web-app).
name: Write a guide on how-to setup of Mifos Community App
